channel.title: Differences between CAN Hitch and Carloop OBD Adapter?
channel.description:
I'm just wondering the differences between the can hitch and the OBD Adapter. I have both of them and I noticed that the same code and the same car, I'm missing messages (or not receiving) using the can hitch. Also, comparing the schematics, I noticed that has different components.
Is there any notable difference?
